author: Kelvera At Dailymail.Com
title: Riley Keough gets political at the awards with Sasha Lane | Daily Mail Online
text: Share She wore a short-sleeve mini dress with matching white ankle boots and long straight hair. Green with envy! Hollywood newcomer Sasha Lane combined her Black Lives Matter top with an olive skirt and jacket set that she glammed up with a chunky gold necklace and chic dreads Simple and chic: The Runaways actress showed off her slim legs in her short dress while keeping her beauty simple with sleek hair and understated makeup The close costars cosied up to each other while 19-year-old Sasha opened up her jacket to show off the Black Lives Matter shirt which was designed to look like a baseball jersey. The Hollywood newcomer spiced up the look with a fierce golden necklace and geometric white makeup around her eyes. Sasha continued to look chic and carefree wearing her dreads decorated with shining thread and metal cuffs. Just like honey! Riley and Sasha got to know each other while working on the indie drama American Honey together Riley and Sasha both starred in the indie drama American Honey The film, which was written and directed by Andrea Arnold, follows the life of a teenage girl who embarks upon a wild journey across the country when she joins a group of rebellious magazine sales. The A24 and Focus Features release is nominated for six awards at tonight's Independent Spirit Award, including Best Feature. 2017 Independent Spirit Awards Winners Best Feature:
